title: Ensure Skip Level button is available in Event 1 and Event 4 gameplay

requirements.text: When the user starts Event 1 (gameId: "default") or Event 4 (gameId: "promises-100"), ensure gameplay always shows a visible "Skip" button that allows the user to skip the current level and advance progress to the next level (except on the final level where skipping is disabled).

quotes:
In event 1 
And even 4
Please add the skip button in it so if user can not do the level  user could skip that

acceptanceCriteria: Starting Event 1 opens gameplay and displays a visible "Skip" button.
Starting Event 4 opens gameplay and displays a visible "Skip" button.
Clicking "Skip" in either event advances the game to the next level (i.e., the displayed level number increments and the next level is playable).
On level 100, the "Skip" button remains visible but is disabled (cannot be clicked).
All user-facing text for the button is in English ("Skip").

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only Shadcn components).
Keep the existing single-screen flow (Events hub -> gameplay) and existing progress persistence behavior intact.
nonGoals: Do not add new events or change event content beyond ensuring skip is available for Event 1 and Event 4 gameplay.
Do not change the level designs or add new puzzle mechanics.
